name: Spaceship Earth
description: Journey through the history of human communication in EPCOT's iconic geodesic sphere, from cave paintings to the digital age.

tips.content: Currently closed for refurbishment until Thanksgiving 2025. Check official Disney app for reopening updates.

name: Test Track 3.0
description: Design your own vehicle and put it through high-speed automotive testing on this reimagined attraction with World of Motion inspiration.

tips.content: Newly reimagined attraction reopened July 2025. Single rider line available for shorter waits.
Design phase can take time - have your group discuss preferences beforehand.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
description: Join the Guardians on a time-traveling adventure through space on this reverse-launch spinning coaster with a rocking soundtrack.

tips.content: No longer requires virtual queue as of February 2025. Standby line now available!
Each ride features a different soundtrack. Multiple rides for different songs!

name: Mission: SPACE
description: Experience the thrill of space exploration with this intense centrifugal simulator mission to Mars. Choose Orange (intense) or Green (less intense).

tips.content: Orange version is very intense with spinning. Green version has no spinning motion.
Don't eat a heavy meal before riding. Motion sickness is common on Orange.

name: Soarin' Around the World
description: Soar over breathtaking landscapes and iconic landmarks from around the world in this immersive flight experience.

tips.content: Center seats in theaters A and B provide the best experience with less distortion.
Experience includes scent effects - notice the orange groves and ocean air!

name: Living with the Land
description: Take a peaceful boat tour through innovative greenhouses and agricultural research labs showcasing sustainable farming techniques.

tips.content: Behind the Seeds tour available for deeper dive into the greenhouse research.
Great attraction for all ages and perfect air-conditioned break from Florida heat.

name: The Seas with Nemo & Friends
description: Join Nemo, Dory, and friends on an underwater adventure that ends with viewing real marine life in one of the world's largest aquariums.

tips.content: Don't miss the massive aquarium after the ride - spend time exploring the marine exhibits.
Look for Turtle Talk with Crush nearby for more underwater fun.

name: Turtle Talk with Crush
description: Have a totally awesome interactive conversation with Crush the sea turtle in this real-time animated experience.

tips.content: Sit close to the front if you want Crush to interact with you directly.
Kids love asking Crush questions - encourage participation!

name: Journey Into Imagination with Figment
description: Follow the mischievous Figment through Dr. Nigel Channing's sensory labs for a wild ride that engages all five senses.

tips.content: Don't miss ImageWorks playground upstairs after the ride for hands-on experiments.
Strong scents and loud noises throughout - be prepared for sensory overload!

name: Frozen Ever After
description: Join Anna, Elsa, and Olaf for a magical boat journey through Arendelle during the Summer Snow Day celebration.

tips.content: One of the most popular attractions at EPCOT. Use Lightning Lane or rope drop strategy.
Small drops and backward sections may surprise some guests.

name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
description: Take a colorful boat ride through Mexico with Donald Duck, José Carioca, and Panchito as they prepare for their concert.

tips.content: Hidden gem with usually short waits. Great for families with young children.
Explore the Mexico pavilion marketplace before or after riding.

name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
description: Shrink down to Remy's size and scurry through Gusteau's restaurant kitchen in this immersive trackless adventure.

tips.content: No height requirement makes this perfect for families. Very popular, so use Lightning Lane.
4D effects include water, air, and scent - you'll feel like you're really in the kitchen!

name: The American Adventure
description: Experience American history through an inspiring 29-minute show featuring advanced Audio-Animatronics and film presentations.

tips.content: Perfect midday break with air conditioning. Show runs continuously throughout the day.
Educational and moving presentation that appeals to all ages, especially history buffs.

name: Anna & Elsa at Royal Sommerhus
description: Meet the royal sisters from Arendelle in their charming Norwegian summer cabin for photos and magical moments.

tips.content: Very popular character meet. Visit early in the day or use Lightning Lane if available.
Located next to Frozen Ever After - combine both experiences in Norway pavilion.

name: Monsieur Paul
description: Upscale French fine dining restaurant offering exquisite cuisine and wine pairings on the second floor of the France Pavilion.

tips.content: Signature dining experience requiring advance reservations. Dress code enforced.
Perfect for special occasions with beautiful views of World Showcase Lagoon.

name: Space 220
description: Unique dining experience that simulates eating in a space station 220 miles above Earth with stunning views of our planet.

tips.content: Most popular dining reservation at EPCOT. Book exactly 60 days in advance.
Elevator experience to 'space' before dining. Views of Earth change throughout meal.

name: Le Cellier Steakhouse
description: Canadian-inspired steakhouse known for excellent steaks, seafood, and the famous cheddar cheese soup.

tips.content: Famous for their cheddar cheese soup and Canadian favorites. Very popular reservation.
Located below ground level in Canada pavilion. Cozy, intimate atmosphere.

name: Akershus Royal Banquet Hall
description: Character dining experience with Disney Princesses serving Norwegian-inspired cuisine in a medieval castle setting.

tips.content: Meet multiple Disney Princesses during your meal. Great for princess fans of all ages.
Buffet-style service with Norwegian and American options. Breakfast is most popular.

name: Garden Grill Restaurant
description: Rotating restaurant offering character dining with Chip 'n' Dale and friends while overlooking Living with the Land attraction.

tips.content: Unique rotating restaurant with views into Living with the Land. Characters visit every table.
Farm-fresh ingredients, many from EPCOT's own gardens. Family-style service.

name: Via Napoli Ristorante e Pizzeria
description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria featuring wood-fired ovens imported from Italy and traditional Italian cuisine.

tips.content: Authentic Neapolitan pizza from wood-fired ovens. Large pizzas great for sharing.
Located in Italy pavilion with outdoor seating available. Popular with families.

name: Rose & Crown Dining Room
description: Traditional British pub offering fish and chips, bangers and mash, and other UK favorites with World Showcase Lagoon views.

tips.content: Great views of EPCOT fireworks from outdoor seating. Traditional British pub atmosphere.
Try the fish and chips or shepherd's pie. British beers and ales available.

name: Biergarten Restaurant
description: Authentic German buffet with live entertainment including traditional folk music and dancing in an Oktoberfest-style hall.

tips.content: Authentic German buffet with live oompah band entertainment. Community seating at large tables.
Great for groups and families. German beers and traditional dishes available.
